data.title: Invercargill Airport Map, Invercargill Airport Code

data.text:
Invercargill Airport, Invercargill, New Zealand [ IVC / NZNV ]

If you are planning to travel to Invercargill or any other city in New Zealand, this airport locator will be a very useful tool. This page gives complete information about the Invercargill Airport along with the airport location map, Time Zone, lattitude and longitude, Current time and date, hotels near the airport etc... Invercargill Airport Map showing the location of this airport in New Zealand. Invercargill Airport IATA Code, ICAO Code, exchange rate etc... is also provided.

Invercargill Airport Info:

Invercargill Airport IATA Code: IVC Invercargill Airport ICAO Code: NZNV Latitude : -46.418 Longitude : 168.326 City : Invercargill Country : New Zealand World Area Code : 851 Airport Type : Medium Invercargill Airport Address / Contact Details :

Invercargill Airport (IVC), Southland 9879, New Zealand, Phone: (64) 3 218 6367, Email: admin@invercargillairport.co.nz Invercargill Website : http://invercargillairport.co.nz/ Airport Type : Public Operator : Invercargill Airport Ltd Timezone : Pacific/Auckland Invercargill Airport Timezone : GMT +12:00 hours Current time and date at Invercargill Airport is 02:10:38 AM (NZST) on Monday, Aug 12, 2024

Looking for information on Invercargill Airport, Invercargill, New Zealand? Know about Invercargill Airport in detail. Find out the location of Invercargill Airport on New Zealand map and also find out airports near to Invercargill. This airport locator is a very useful tool for travelers to know where is Invercargill Airport located and also provide information like hotels near Invercargill Airport, airlines operating to Invercargill Airport etc... IATA Code and ICAO Code of all airports in New Zealand. Scroll down to know more about Invercargill Airport or Invercargill Airport, New Zealand.
